name: Quantity Service Address Location Information
title: QSA
definition: Identifies the total number of Service Address Location Information Forms being sent by the customer.
usageNotes:
Prohibited when the EVCI field is "A". 
Required when the ACT field is "N" or "T", the first position of the REQTYP field is "S", "E", "W", "V" or "X", the NAG and SEI fields are not populated, and the first position of any PRILOC/SECLOC field is an "E".  
Required when the ACT field is "N" and the first position of the REQTYP field is "R" and the first position of the PRILOC field is "E" and the SPO T  ( PRI )  field is not a CLLI Code on the Ring or ARI Form.  
Required when the ACT field is "N" or "T" and the first position of the REQTYP field is "A" and the NSL field on the FGA Form is populated. 
Required when the first position of the REQTYP is "E", the ACT field is "M" or "N" and the SEI field is populated. 
Prohibited  w hen the first position of the REQTYP field is "M". 
Prohibited when the first position of the REQTYP field is "S" and the SEI field is populated. 8%3A  Prohibited when the NAG field is populated.  Quantity Service Address Location Information (continued)9%3A Otherwise optional.
fieldNotes: QSA cannot be greater than "01" when the REQTYP field is "E" and the SEI field is populated.
